comments:
Here is this bug again. Weird that search for duplicates can't find the first report.

-- Error Log --
Date: Fri Nov 24 15:28:06 EST 2006
Message: Could not download report

Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar.core
Stack Trace:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Arguments to addParameter(String, String) cannot be null
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod.addParameter(PostMethod.java:267)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.JiraWebSession.login(JiraWebSession.java:99)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.JiraWebSession.doInSession(JiraWebSession.java:89)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.rss.RSSJiraFilterService.quickSearch(RSSJiraFilterService.java:93)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.soap.SoapJiraService.getIssue(SoapJiraService.java:170)
	at org.tigris.jira.core.service.CachedRpcJiraServer.getIssue(CachedRpcJiraServer.java:439)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.core.JiraOfflineTaskHandler.downloadTaskData(JiraOfflineTaskHandler.java:81)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.SynchronizeTaskJob.syncTask(SynchronizeTaskJob.java:147)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.SynchronizeTaskJob.run(SynchronizeTaskJob.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Please consider searching for duplicates yourself until we get that functionality improved. That is something that we request of everyone on the Bugs page.  Also, pelase give bugs meaningful Summaries.  I wonder if we should stop auto-populating the summary...

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 165812 ***

(In reply to comment #1)
> Please consider searching for duplicates yourself until we get that
> functionality improved. That is something that we request of everyone on the
> Bugs page.  

I thought you could use this report when improving that... :-)

> Also, pelase give bugs meaningful Summaries.  I wonder if we should
> stop auto-populating the summary...

There is no meaningful summary. I don't really know what the impact of this error that I see in the log.

We still have improved it on for 1.0 (bug 156062).  Rob, seriously consider doing it (or maybe bug Eugene to help out since he wants it ;)  It could save us a lot of bug spam post 1.0, and adding that offset fuzz factor should be easy.

(In reply to comment #3)
> Rob, seriously consider doing it (or maybe bug Eugene to help out since he wants it ;)  

It is not like I want it. Just thought you could use this info. ;-P
You'll want it when more people are filing bugs from the error view on the web connector :)

traces.message: Arguments to addParameter(String, String) cannot be null
